EmailTemplate.subject: Enterprise Fleet Management/ExxonMobil Fleet National Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Per my voice mail,I wanted to give you an overview of the Enterprise Fleet Management/ExxonMobil Fleet National card. I know you will find that our card is the perfect tool to help you save money and time when it comes to your vehicle fleet operations.
Savings
Save 5 cents per gallon every time you fuel at an Exxon- or Mobil-branded station!
Security
Driver specific authorization at the pump.
Convenience & Control
Accepted at more than 90% of all US retail fueling locations including more than 10,000 Exxon- or Mobil-branded stations nationwide. Easy online controls so you can set spending limits and monitor driver behavior.
I will be following up with you next week. In the mean time, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to helping you meet the needs of your business.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} {!User.Phone} {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
